snippet: The Houston Astros, after finishing dead last in their division two years in a row, are repurposing a state song in their “Whole New Ballgame” campaign.
abstract: Advertising column notes Houston Astros, after finishing dead last in their division two years in row, are repurposing Texas state song in their Whole New Ballgame campaign.
lead_paragraph: The Houston Astros, after finishing dead last in their division two years in a row, are repurposing a state song in their “Whole New Ballgame” campaign.

headline.main: Deep in the Heart of Baseball
